description.narrative: - Technology development: Support the development and application of a specialized LED technology that could transform the way the world approaches sterilization and sanitation, Four million people die every year from waterborne diseases. The vast majority of them live in developing countries. DUV LED presents a non-chemical, low energy use (energy efficient), and non toxic (non mercury) alternative to sanitation. - Employment: as the Company continues to expand, it is expected to create additional employment opportunities, both in manufacturing of LED chips and more importantly, help to create a generation of experts in China with deep specialized knowledge in a niche market. - Environmental improvements and climate change mitigation: the Project supports the development of a technology that will have an important impact on CO2 reduction as well as through the replacement of toxic mercury arc lamps.

Established in 2001, Qingdao Jason Electric Co (QD Jason or the Company) develops technology and application products for deep ultraviolet (DUV) LEDs, a growing niche segment of the LED market. QD Jason focuses on emitters outside the visible spectrum, the deep ultra violet spectrum. At these wavelengths, the ultraviolet LED is especially suitable for disrupting the replication of DNA and other reproductive molecules in harmful bacteria, which have significant potential in applications such as air and water purification, medical equipment sterilization. The funds raised will be deployed to expand manufacturing facilities, develop sales and marketing, and expand product offerings and application portfolio.
